#summary Declaration of delegates.
<wiki:toc max_depth="3"/>

= Delegate declaration =
The syntax to declare a delegate is specified by:
<blockquote><em>
delegate-declaration:
    annotations<sub>opt</sub> delegate-modifiers<sub>opt</sub> <tt>delegate</tt> return-type identifier type-parameter-list<sub>opt</sub> ( formal-parameter-list<sub>opt</sub> ) type-parameter-constraints-clauses<sub>opt</sub> ;
</em></blockquote>
A delegate type is an abstract class derived from {{{stab.lang.Delegate}}}. It defines an abstract method named {{{invoke}}} with the same signature as the delegate.

= Delegate modifiers =
The delegate modifiers control the access to the type.
<blockquote><em>
delegate-modifiers:
    delegate-modifier<br/>
    delegate-modifiers delegate-modifier
delegate-modifier:
    <b>One of</b> <tt>public protected private</tt>
</em></blockquote>
